title: Customer Churn Analysis
text:
ðŸ“Š Customer Churn Analysis and Prediction
This project analyzed customer data to predict churn and identify key factors driving attrition.
Tools: R, Python (scikit-learn), Power BI
Highlights: - Built predictive model to identify at-risk customers
- Created visual dashboards to track churn rates
- Proposed actionable strategies to enhance customer retention
